LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_Damp: An OS update has destabilised {0}. Its secrets have been lost!
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_Insects: A quantum tunneling incident has resulted in {0} being destroyed!
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_AI: A malicious Archo-being has targeted {0} and wiped the data within!
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_polarity: An isometric polarity shift has destabilised {0} and wiped the data within!
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_recorded: Through unknown means, the data on {0} has been overwritten with footage of ancient televsion programs!
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_not_safe: {0} was not safely ejected last time it was used and the data has been corrupted.
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_Fade: A solar flare has destabilised {0}! The knowledge it contained is now lost.
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_Rodents: An ancient virus predating the colony has been discovered on {0}. It has been safely destroyed so the virus cannot spread, however the knowledge is irretrievably lost.
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_CleanUpS: {PAWN_nameDef} spilled {PAWN_possessive} drink near a bookshelf. In {PAWN_possessive} haste, {PAWN_pronoun} used "{0}" to soak up the spill, rendering it unreadable.
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_TP: {PAWN_nameDef} was caught short. In {PAWN_possessive} haste, {PAWN_pronoun} grabbed "{0}" to wipe with, leaving it a smeared useless mess.
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_PaperAir: {PAWN_nameDef} was making paper airplanes. While not paying attention, {PAWN_pronoun} grabbed "{0}". The plane flew straight out the window and into a dirty puddle, soaking away any ink and leaving it blank and muddy.
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_Solidari: {PAWN_nameDef} was gripped by a sudden fervor for the proletariat. Declaring "{0}" to be a product of bourgeois decadence, {PAWN_pronoun} burned the document in a defiant act of solidarity with the working class.
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_Smokelea: {PAWN_nameDef} was desperate for a hit of smokeleaf and, lacking proper papers, decided that "{0}" looked like the perfect substitute. {PAWN_pronoun} rolled a massive joint with the research, and the colony's progress went up in a thick, fragrant cloud of smoke.
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_DampMult: Damp has gotten into the knowledge stores and destroyed {0}. Their secrets have been lost to moisture and mold.
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_InsectsM: An aggressive insect hive has eaten through many documents: {0}.\nTheir secrets have been lost!
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_RodentsM: Rodents have nested in the archives and shredded many documents for bedding material: {0}.\nThe knowledge is irretrievably lost.
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_ShotMult: A stray shot from {PAWN_nameDef}'s gun as they were carelessly twirling it around their finger shredded {0}. The knowledge is irretrievably lost.
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_TechRegressionDesc: Your colony's technological understanding has regressed. The loss of knowledge brings consequences. Choose which burden your people must bear.
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_MustChoosePenalty: You must choose a burden to bear. This window cannot be closed until you make a selection.
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_TechToDestroyAtATime: Tech To Destroy At A Time
